labels.analysis: The MCP Server is designed to manage and organize Zoom meeting transcripts. It provides tools to list, search, download, and extract actionable items from transcripts, with functionality to check locally stored transcripts and interface with Zoom's cloud storage. The core purpose is to streamline the workflow of users who need to access, search, and organize meeting transcripts efficiently.
labels.reasoning: The primary functionality of the server centers around the management and utilization of meeting transcripts, which aligns most closely with the "Communication Tools" category. The server also has capabilities related to organizing and searching text content, which could be secondary to the main communication-focused tools. Given the specialized nature of the server, no custom label is necessary as its functionality is well-covered by predefined categories.

remote_server_response.error: unhandled errors in a TaskGroup (1 sub-exception)

server_info_crawled.name: Zoom Transcript Server
server_info_crawled.author: @forayconsulting/zoom_transcript_mcp
server_info_crawled.overview: Manage your Zoom meeting transcripts effortlessly. List, download, and search through your transcripts with a structured interface, ensuring you never miss important discussions. Streamline your workflow by organizing transcripts by month for easy access.

tools.name: get_recent_transcripts
tools.description: Deploy Server Zoom Transcript Server Claim Server @forayconsulting/zoom_transcript_mcp Try in Playground get_recent_transcripts

tools.name: search_transcripts
tools.description: Search across Zoom meeting transcripts for specific content. This tool will search through locally stored transcripts first.

tools.name: extract_action_items
tools.description: Identify and extract action items, tasks and commitments from meeting transcripts

tools.name: check_local_transcripts
tools.description: Check what transcripts are already downloaded and available locally

tools.name: download_transcript
tools.description: Download a specific Zoom meeting transcript from the cloud to local storage

tools.name: list_meetings
tools.description: List available Zoom meetings with recordings that exist in the cloud

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@forayconsulting/zoom_transcript_mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
